org.apache.james.container.spring.lifecycle

Class ConfigurationProviderImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.james.container.spring.lifecycle.ConfigurationProviderImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationProvider, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.context.ResourceLoaderAware

    public class ConfigurationProviderImpl
extends Object
implements ConfigurationProvider, org.springframework.context.ResourceLoaderAware, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    Register Configuration and act as Configuration Provider.

      Register a HierarchicalConfiguration for a bean name.
      It is not mandatory to use the registerConfiguration to have the configuration available as the ConfigurationProvider.getConfiguration(String) method may load it based on conventions (naming,...).

      • registerConfiguration

        public void registerConfiguration(String beanName,
                         org.apache.commons.configuration.HierarchicalConfiguration conf)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationProvider
        Register a HierarchicalConfiguration for a bean name.
        It is not mandatory to use the registerConfiguration to have the configuration available as the ConfigurationProvider.getConfiguration(String) method may load it based on conventions (naming,...).
        Specified by:
        registerConfiguration in interface ConfigurationProvider
        Parameters:
        beanName - The bean name for which the configuration has to be registered.
        conf - The hierarchical configuration to register for the bean name.
        See Also:
        ConfigurationProvider.registerConfiguration(String, HierarchicalConfiguration)

      • getConfiguration

        public org.apache.commons.configuration.HierarchicalConfiguration getConfiguration(String name)
                                                                            throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationProvider
        Load and return the configuration for the bean with the given name. The configuration may already be loaded from a previous method invocation or from a previous configuration registration via the ConfigurationProvider.registerConfiguration(String, HierarchicalConfiguration).
        This method may implement convention based configuration loading based on naming,...
        Specified by:
        getConfiguration in interface ConfigurationProvider
        Returns:
        config
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        See Also:
        ConfigurationProvider.getConfiguration(java.lang.String)
